definition: to shed/to take off/to escape/to get away from

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: This book is based on seven years of conversations with North Koreans.
sentences.chinese: 這本書也是基於七年來對脫北者的訪談。

sentences.english: So says Park Cheol-hwan, a North Korean defector now living in Seoul, the South Korean capital.
sentences.chinese: 現居韓國首都首爾的脫北者樸哲煥如是說。

sentences.english: Of course, North Korean defectors always have an interest in painting Mr.
sentences.chinese: 當然，脫北者對金正日進行不堪描繪對自己有好處。
